entities.name: Table
entities.description: A database or data structure component used for storing rows and columns of data.

entities.name: ChatCompletionTool
entities.description: A tool designed for creating chat completions.

entities.name: Client
entities.description: Represents a client in a system, possibly referring to a database client or an API client.

entities.name: WorkspaceGroup
entities.description: A group within a workspace, possibly referring to a collection of stages, storage, or other workspace-related resources.

entities.name: Connection
entities.description: Represents a connection to a database or other service.

relationships.description: ChatCompletionTool uses z (zod) for parameter validation.
Client performs operations on Table, such as creating chat completions and managing columns.
WorkspaceGroup manages stages, including creating, updating, and deleting stage folders or files.
Connection utilizes Client to execute custom queries.
